verbs.description: [ARG0: Mexico] [V: told] [ARG2: the U.S.] [ARG1: that it can be flexible on automotive wages and content in exchange for President Donald Trump ’s negotiators withdrawing some of their other toughest demands] , [ARGM-ADV: according to two people familiar with the talks] .

Mexico told the U.S. that it [V: can] be flexible on automotive wages and content in exchange for President Donald Trump ’s negotiators withdrawing some of their other toughest demands , according to two people familiar with the talks .

Mexico told the U.S. that [ARG1: it] [ARGM-MOD: can] [V: be] [ARG2: flexible on automotive wages and content] [ARGM-ADV: in exchange for President Donald Trump ’s negotiators withdrawing some of their other toughest demands] , [ARGM-ADV: according to two people familiar with the talks] .

Mexico told the U.S. that it can be flexible on automotive wages and content in exchange for [ARG0: President Donald Trump ’s negotiators] [V: withdrawing] [ARG1: some of their other toughest demands] , according to two people familiar with the talks .

Mexico told the U.S. that it can be flexible on automotive wages and content in exchange for President Donald Trump ’s negotiators withdrawing some of their other toughest demands , [V: according] to two people familiar with the talks .
